item.description:
Edible landscape plants with Dan Franek of SMCC Horticulture. Franek has some great examples of edibles to talk to us about...with many on site at SMCC!

6:00 meet to view examples of edible landscape plants during daylight at SMCC (meet at entrance to Horticulture Bldg)

7:15-ish meet inside the horticulture building to share potluck food and learn more about edible plants!

PARKING is available in the lot across from the Horticulture Bldg.

Potluck breakdown:
Last name starting with A-G bring whatever you want
Last name starting with H-M bring bread or beverage
Last name starting with N-S main or side dish to share
Last name starting with T-Z bring salad or veg or dessert

Please see our Meetup Event RSVP Guidelines:
http://permaculture.m...

If this event is full and you would like to get on the waiting list for an open spot, RSVP "no" with a comment that you'd like to get in...

Please remember to bring your own potluck kit (plate/bowl/utensils/cup/napkin)!

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: 2nd Annual Edible Landscape Plants Meetup
